trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control that displays a frame around a group of controls with an optional caption.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en Windows-kontroll som viser ramme en filgruppe kontroller med et valgfritt teksten.

trans-unit.source: The GroupBox displays a frame around a group of controls with or without a caption.
trans-unit.target: Gruppeboksen viser ramme en filgruppe kontroller med eller uten en tekst.

trans-unit.source: Use a GroupBox to logically group a collection of controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en gruppeboks som brukes til å gruppere logisk en samling med i et skjema.

trans-unit.source: The group box is a container control that can be used to define groups of controls.
trans-unit.target: Grupperingsboksen er en beholderkontroll som kan brukes til å definere grupper med kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The typical use for a group box is to contain a logical group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: Vanlig bruk for en gruppe som inneholder en logisk gruppe med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: If you have two group boxes, each of which contain several option buttons (also known as radio buttons), each group of buttons is mutually exclusive, setting one option value per group.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har to gruppe-boksene som inneholder flere alternativknapper (også kjent som alternativknapper), er hver gruppe på knappene utelukker hverandre, aktiveres ett alternativverdi per gruppe.

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the GroupBox by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til kontroller i gruppeboksen til ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only controls that are contained within the GroupBox control can be selected or receive focus.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bare kontroller som finnes i gruppeboksen kontrollen kan velges, eller få fokus.

trans-unit.source: The complete GroupBox itself cannot be selected or receive focus.
trans-unit.target: Fullført gruppeboksen selve kan ikke velges, eller få fokus.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan denne kontrollen skal svare på det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>metoder, kan du se følgende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>medlemmer: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GroupBox cannot display a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Gruppeboksen kan ikke vise en rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: If you need a control similar to a GroupBox that can contain a scroll bar, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger en kontroll ligner en gruppeboks som kan inneholde en rullefeltet, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property is set to `false` when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> is created.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>er satt til `false` når en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: The group box has an initial height of 100 pixels and width of 200 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Grupperingsboksen har en opprinnelig høyden på 100 piksler og bredden på 200 piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control will allow drag-and-drop operations and events to be used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal tillate dra og slipp-operasjoner og hendelser som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow drag-and-drop operations and events to be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>tillate dra og slipp-operasjoner og hendelser som skal brukes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> resizes based on its contents.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> endrer basert på innholdet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> automatically resizes based on its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> skaleres automatisk basert på innholdet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSize*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> behaves when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvordan <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> fungerer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>egenskapen er aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt tilgjengelighet-objekt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke eksplisitt kalle metoden CreateAccessibilityInstance, den kan kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>egenskapen det refereres til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som inneholder de nødvendige oppretting parameterne når håndtaket for kontrollen som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> structure that contains the default padding settings for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> struktur som inneholder standard fylle innstillinger for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default padding indicates the padding on each side of the control is three pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standard-utfyllingen angir utfyllingen på hver side av kontrollen er tre piksler.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> with all its edges set to three pixels.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> med alle kantene satt til tre piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a rectangle that represents the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter et rektangel som representerer størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> with the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> med målene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren dobbeltklikker du <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the group box control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir flate stil utseendet til gruppen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> with a FlatStyle value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> does not receive mouse events.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>med FlatStyle verdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>mottar ikke musen hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren trykker en tast mens den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: Fordi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>kontrollen kan ikke hente fokus, denne hendelsen oppstår aldri.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren trykker en tast mens den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: Fordi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>kontrollen kan ikke hente fokus, denne hendelsen oppstår aldri.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a key while the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren slipper en tast mens den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: Fordi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>kontrollen kan ikke hente fokus, denne hendelsen oppstår aldri.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> kontroll med musen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren dobbeltklikker du <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> kontroll med musen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren trykker en museknappen når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.
trans-unit.target: Skjer når musepekeren kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når musepekeren forlater kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren flytter pekeren over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a mouse button while the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren slipper en museknappen når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Behandler etikettens tegn.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som brukes til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet ble behandlet som en mnemonisk av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Scales the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> by the specified factor and scaling instruction.
trans-unit.target: Skalaer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> av den angitte faktoren og skalering behandlingsinstruksjon.

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this method will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen øverste nivå, vil ikke denne metoden skalere kontrollens plassering.

trans-unit.source: This method does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan ikke skaleres underordnede eller størrelsen på automatisk størrelse kontroller.

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan utelate skalering i en retning ved å endre verdien for den `specified` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> that indicates the height and width of the scaled control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> som angir høyden og bredden på skalert kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values that indicates how the control should be scaled.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdier som angir hvordan kontrollen skal skaleres.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can press the TAB key to give the focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan trykke TAB for å gi fokus til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the TabStop property to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot receive focus.
trans-unit.target: Selv om du kan angi egenskapen TabStop til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>kontrollen kan ikke få fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow the user to press the TAB key to give the focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Tillat brukeren å trykker du TAB for å gi fokus til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, eventuell.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan ikke overstyres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, hvis aktuelt, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> er uten navn.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om du vil bruke den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> klassen ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"> </xref> klassen ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) til å gjengi tekst

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Den `UseCompatibleTextRendering` egenskapen er ikke ment å gi visual kompatibilitet mellom Windows Forms-Kontroller at gjengivelse tekst ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>klassen og [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] og [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] programmer som utfører gjengivelse av egendefinert tekst ved hjelp av <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klasse.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller Hvis programmet ikke blir oppgradert fra [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], anbefales det at du har forlatt `UseCompatibleTextRendering` satt til standardverdien for `false`.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] basert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>klassen ble introdusert i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] for å forbedre ytelsen, gjør teksten se bedre, og forbedre støtte for internasjonale skrifter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: I tidligere versjoner av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] basert <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klassen ble brukt til å utføre gjengivelse av alle text.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]beregner tegnavstand og tekstbryting forskjellig fra [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: I et Windows Forms-program som bruker den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klasse for å gjengi tekst, dette kan føre til at teksten for kontroller som bruker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>vises forskjellig fra teksten i applikasjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere for å løse denne versjoner av `UseCompatibleTextRendering` egenskapen `true` for en bestemt kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Angi `UseCompatibleTextRendering` til `true` for alle støttede kontroller i programmet, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode med en parameter for `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> klassen som skal brukes til å utføre teksten gjengivelse for kompatibilitet med versjon 1.0 og 1.1.

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: av .NET Framework; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.
